summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Teams and Audit Log features in RentMaestro. All 21 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing confirmed Teams page and History page are fully functional with proper data-testid attributes.
passed_tests: Teams - Get team details with members (GET /api/teams/{id})
Teams - Invite with different roles (admin, member, viewer)
Audit - Log created on property create
Audit - Log created on property update with changes tracked
Audit - Log created on property delete
Audit - Log created on tenant CRUD
Audit - Log created on team create
Audit - Filter logs by entity type
Frontend - Teams page loads with data-testid='teams-page'
Frontend - Create team button and dialog work
Frontend - Team name and description inputs work
Frontend - History page loads with data-testid='history-page'
Frontend - Audit logs display correctly with action badges
Frontend - Filter dropdown shows all entity types

test_credentials.note: Test users created dynamically during tests with pattern test_*@example.com

seed_data_creation: Test data created during tests with TEST_ prefix for easy identification
context_for_next_testing_agent: Teams and Audit Log features are fully functional. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_teams_audit.py cover all CRUD operations and audit logging. Frontend has proper data-testid attributes for Teams page (teams-page, create-team-btn, team-name-input, team-description-input, save-team-btn, invite-btn, invite-email-input, send-invite-btn) and History page (history-page, search-history, filter-entity-type).
